table.name: ship_unit_special_service
table.description: Defines special services required for this ship unit.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The ship unit GID associated with the order release.

columns.name: SPECIAL_SERVICE_GID
columns.description: The special service identifier defining the special service that needs to be performed for the ship unit.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: The special service associated with the remark.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
